Subrecords.Content: Your grandmother invites you to tea, but youre surprised when she gives you a pistol, and orders you to kill another vault resident. What do you do?

Button.ButtonText: Obey your elder and kill the resident with the pistol.
Offer your most prized possession for the residents life.
Ask granny for some cyanide to cook into the resident's next meal instead.
Throw your tea in grannys face.
